name: Certified SAFeÂ® 5 Practitioner
description: Demonstrated proficiency in applying the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) principles and practices. Skilled in facilitating Agile Release Trains (ARTs), coordinating multiple teams, and implementing Lean-Agile practices at scale. Applied knowledge to drive organizational agility and deliver value to customers efficiently.

name: Sequences, Time Series and Prediction
description: 1) Solve time series and forecasting problems in TensorFlow 2) Prepared data for time series learning using best practices 3) Explored how RNNs and ConvNets can be used for predictions 4) Build a sunspot prediction model using real-world data

name: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization
description: Gained expertise in optimizing deep learning models through hyperparameter tuning, regularization, and advanced optimization algorithms. Applied practical implementations using Python and TensorFlow, demonstrating proficiency in enhancing model performance and mitigating overfitting.

name: Sequence Models
description: Mastered RNNs, LSTMs, and sequence processing for NLP and speech recognition. Proficient in implementing with Python and TensorFlow.

name: Natural Language Processing in TensorFlow
description: Gained expertise in NLP techniques using TensorFlow. Proficient in building and optimizing neural networks for tasks like sentiment analysis, text generation, and machine translation. Applied practical implementations in Python, demonstrating proficiency in NLP with TensorFlow.

name: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
description: Mastered foundational concepts in neural networks and deep learning. Proficient in building and training neural networks using Python and TensorFlow. Applied knowledge to solve various real-world problems, demonstrating proficiency in deep learning fundamentals.

name: Structuring Machine Learning Projects
description: Gained expertise in designing and organizing machine learning projects for optimal performance. Proficient in strategies for data splitting, error analysis, and model evaluation. Applied practical implementations to tackle complex machine learning challenges, demonstrating proficiency in structuring ML projects effectively.

name: Java Programming: Arrays, Lists, and Structured Data
description: Mastered fundamental concepts in Java programming including arrays, lists, and structured data. Proficient in implementing algorithms and data structures in Java, enabling efficient manipulation and organization of data. Applied practical exercises to reinforce understanding and develop strong programming skills.

name: Data Structures with C++
description: Attained comprehensive knowledge of data structures and OOP principles in C++. Proficient in implementing advanced data structures such as linked lists, trees, and graphs, and applying OOP concepts like inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. Successfully completed practical assignments to reinforce understanding and develop robust programming skills.

name: C Programming
description: Matered the foundational concepts of C programming including variables, loops, functions, and pointers. Proficient in writing procedural code and solving problems using C language constructs. Successfully completed practical exercises to solidify understanding and develop essential programming skills in C.
